fulfillment.speech: Your rights as a flatmate depend on the agreement you have with the tenant or tenants. It’s a good idea to have a written flatmate agreement so that everyone knows what their responsibilities are. You can find a template here: [Template agreement https://www.tenancy.govt.nz/assets/Forms-templates/Flat-house-sharing-agreement.pdf] [more] If there’s a dispute between a tenant and a flatmate (e.g. about rent or electricity or internet bills), this can be taken to the Disputes Tribunal. [FU: Want to know about taking something to the Disputes Tribunal?: Disputes Tribunal]

messages.speech:
Your rights as a flatmate depend on the agreement you have with the tenant or tenants. It’s a good idea to have a written flatmate agreement so that everyone knows what their responsibilities are. You can find a template here: 
[Template agreement https://www.tenancy.govt.nz/assets/Forms-templates/Flat-house-sharing-agreement.pdf]
[more]
If there’s a dispute between a tenant and a flatmate (e.g. about rent or electricity or internet bills), this can be taken to the Disputes Tribunal.
[FU: Want to know about taking something to the Disputes Tribunal?: Disputes Tribunal]
